alert.note: Alert for Davison; Hanson; Hutchinson; McCook; Miner; Sanborn (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 12:17AM MDT until June 13 at 1:00AM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 AM CDT FOR DAVISON...SOUTHERN SANBORN...MINER...WESTERN MCCOOK...HANSON AND NORTHERN HUTCHINSON COUNTIES... At 116 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Letcher to near Mitchell to 7 miles west of Dimock, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. Winds of 65 mph were reported between Mount Vernon and Mitchell at 115 am. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. These severe storms will be near... Mitchell, Letcher and Loomis around 120 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Ethan, Artesian, Fulton, Alexandria, Fedora, Farmer, Roswell, Emery, Howard, Bridgewater, Spencer In McCook County, Canova, Vilas and Salem. TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Intense thunderstorm lines can produce brief tornadoes and widespread significant wind damage. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, it is best to move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. These storms may cause serious injury and significant property damage.

area.areaDesc: Davison; Hanson; Hutchinson; McCook; Miner; Sanborn
